Synonyms.Synonym: Chronic obstructive airways disease - day to day
Chronic obstructive lung disease - day to day

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Day to day with COPD
QAPair.Answer: Your doctor gave you the news: you have COPD (chronic obstructive pulmonary disease). There is no cure, but there are things you can do every day to keep COPD from getting worse, to protect your lungs, and to stay healthy.
